data.text:
@johncardillo @GovRonDeSantis @FLSurgeonGen Public health experts say the latest message from DeSantis and Ladapo, which goes against advice from all national health and medical organizations, could hurt children.
https://t.co/nW0kNTIRTV

@johncardillo @GovRonDeSantis @FLSurgeonGen It's sad how some people refuse to believe facts, studies, or common sense and just want to go with the narrative they've been following because they can't admit they were wrong and got swindled.
@johncardillo @JeremyRedfernFL @GovRonDeSantis @FLSurgeonGen This is the epitome of covid theater.

@johncardillo @JeremyRedfernFL @GovRonDeSantis @FLSurgeonGen “To say he’s out of the mainstream would be an understatement,” said Dr. Ashish K. Jha, dean of the Brown University School of Public Health. “His views are not only very unorthodox — they don’t make any sense.”
https://t.co/haSD4oL5BM

@JeremyRedfernFL @kgunoffense @johncardillo @GovRonDeSantis @FLSurgeonGen It only protects physicians to call their own shots until they get sued for malpractice. Which is not mandatory to have malpractice as a physician in Florida. 

So the patient loses on both fronts.

@JeremyRedfernFL @johncardillo @GovRonDeSantis @FLSurgeonGen Thank u for the reply. Why does it reference FL Statute 768.381 stating "govt-issued health standards" must be used to maintain the liability shield?

@kgunoffense @johncardillo @GovRonDeSantis @FLSurgeonGen Because it protects physicians that want to administer early treatment as they see fit. 

The hospitals have lawyers. They’ll be fine with or without the protections.

@johncardillo @GovRonDeSantis @FLSurgeonGen Brilliant! Well Done Governor! All World Class Medical and Scientific Professionals discussing OPENLY the LIES and DISTORTION of the COVID MANIPULATORS and OPENLY discussing Normality, Common Sense and Real Solutions!
@johncardillo @JeremyRedfernFL @GovRonDeSantis @FLSurgeonGen Dr Malone was vocal on Gettr urging the VETO of SB7014. I hope he finds out for all of us why the Governor approved it.
